data.name: Roquette
data.description:
Together with our customers, Roquette addresses societal challenges by unlocking the potential of nature to offer the best ingredients for food, nutrition and health markets.
These ingredients respond to unique and essential needs, enable healthier lifestyles and are critical components of life-saving medicines.
We're improving the well-being of millions of people all over the world while taking care of resources and territories.

data.name: KLEPTOSE
data.description:
KLEPTOSE® Beta-cyclodextrins are efficient solubilizers, stabilization enhancers and taste-masking agents. A full range is available for use in many dosage forms, from solid to liquid. Molecular encapsulation with beta-cyclodextrins is an accepted and useful tool for pharmaceutical formulators, with many pharmaceutical products containing cyclodextrin complexes on the market. Roquette has developed a wide range of KLEPTOSE® offering features like low water content, various particle size and directly compressible properties with KLEPTOSE® DC.

Roquette has pioneered the industrial development of cyclodextrins with its KLEPTOSE® range of beta-cyclodextrins.

KLEPTOSE® can be used in various oral dosage forms in both pharmaceutical and nutraceutical applications including swallowable tablets, chewable tablets, effervescent tablets, lozenges, hard capsules, soft capsules, orally dissolving films, blends, granules, pellets premix, medicated confectionary, syrups, suspensions and liquids.

data.name: Beauté by Roquette
data.description:
Sustainable Beauty is all about Skin Health and Nutrition

Empowered by more than 85 years of recognized experience in Health & Nutrition, Roquette is now applying its expertise to Beauty through sustainable, innovative and high performance plant-based raw materials.

Sensory benefits are essential to beauty rituals because they transform cosmetic products into holistic pleasurable experiences, people love indulging in. As people also need to feel perfectly safe, they are looking for products with the right balance between nature & technology. That’s why we focus on high-quality, versatile and sustainable plant-based ingredients and develop multi-functional solutions providing high performance and an amazing sensorial experience.

data.name: NUTRALYS

properties.name: Labeling Claims
items: Not Hazardous under OSHA Hazard Communication Standard

data.description: Each product in the NUTRALYS® line is designed meet different functional and nutritional needs for virtually any food or beverage application. Sourced according to the industry’s leading quality protocols, NUTRALYS® Pea Proteins deliver healthy, sustainable solutions.

data.name: PREGEFLO
data.description: PREGEFLO® are clean-label pre-gelatinized starches (also called pre-cooked or instant starch) derived from potato that expand in cold water enabling the formulation of new and original textures in salty snacks.

data.name: XYLISORB
data.description: XYLISORB® Xylitol sugar-free sweetener with a high cooling effect.

data.name: MICROCEL
data.description:
MICROCEL® is  the pure  form of  Microcrystalline Cellulose, serving as insoluble fiber, extrusion auxiliary, anti-caking and compression agent. It’s a physiologically inert, safe, sugar and gluten-free.

Microcrystalline Cellulose is obtained  through  acid  hydrolysis of cellulose, a substance naturally present in plants, fruits, and vegetables.
Roquette sells these products under the MICROCEL® brand. MICRCOCEL® is a 100% insoluble fiber, physiologically inert, safe, sugar and gluten-free. 

Roquette’s team of experts – backed by its application lab and pilot equipment – is always ready to help you make the most of the benefits you are looking for in your development project or to help you meet your product optimization targets.  Contact us to discuss your needs!

data.name: PEARLITOL
data.description: PEARLITOL® Flash Co-processed mannitol starch provides excipient functional properties of filler/binder as well as some disintegrant benefit to your orally dispersable tablets. PEARLITOL® Flash offers excellent chemical inertness, consistent rapid disintegration whatever the compression force making tablet formulation surprisingly simple. It is a compound of mannitol and starch adapted to direct compression formulation. PEARLITOL® Flash can be used in various oral dosage forms in both pharmaceutical and nutraceutical applications including fast disintegrating tablets and orally dispersible tablets.

data.name: LYCASIN
data.description: LYCASIN® Maltitol Syrup is a sugar substitute with a sweet flavor used in a variety of applications including baking, cereals & snacks and confectionary. LYCASIN Maltitol Syrups were specifically developed to not produce acids or cause tooth decay as they are not metabolized by the oral bacteria.

data.name: GLUCIDEX® Maltodextrin
data.description: GLUCIDEX® corn maltodextrins are plant-based carbohydrates that provide fully available energy. They also serve as bulking agents in a variety of food applications. Full solubility and neutral taste benefits applications including soups, seasonings and powdered beverages.  GLUCIDEX® corn maltodextrins provide 100% glucose-based energy that is lactose & gluten-free with high digestibility and excellent digestive tolerance

data.name: VITEN® Vital Wheat Gluten
data.description:
VITEN® Vital Wheat Gluten is a native wheat protein used in milling and baking recipes, pasta and breakfast cereals.

Benefits


Improved consistency
Extended shelf life


Features


Derived from wheat flour
Obtained by non-chemical wet extraction
Water-insoluble complex protein
Visco-elasticity properties when hydrated

data.name: CLEARAM® CH 20 20 Modified Starch
data.description:
CLEARAM® CH 20 20 is a cook-up modified starch derived from waxy corn (E1422) that provides thickening to fillings, dairy, weaning foods and sauces.

Features


High temperature, high shear resistant
pH range of 3.5 to 7.5
Good freeze/thaw stability

data.name: SweetPearl® P200 Maltitol Powder
data.description:
SweetPearl® P200 Maltitol Powder is a tooth-friendly sugar substitute that can be used in a variety of food and nutrition applications.

Benefits


Sugar-free
Halal-certified

data.name: GLUCIDEX® Maltodextrin IT 19 Dispersible
data.description:
GLUCIDEX® IT 19 maltodextrin is a high-quality carbohydrate that can be used in food applications including soups, seasonings, flavors, powdered beverages and more.

Features


Produced from non-GMO corn starch
Easily dispersible
Free-flowing properties improve solubilization and reduce formation of dust
Easy to handle
Neutral taste
Ideal as a bulking agent and drying carrier

data.name: LYCASIN® 80/55 non-GMO Maltitol Syrup
data.description:
LYCASIN® 80/55 non-GMO maltitol syrup is a toothfriendly sweetener used in confectionery and baking applications.

Benefits


Non-GMO
Sugar-free


Features


Anti-crystallization 
Enhanced shelf life
Non-cariogenic

data.name: NUTRALYS® F85M Pea Protein Isolate
data.description:
NUTRALYS® F85M Pea Protein Isolate is a functional pea protein that provides emulsifying and gelling properties for culinary applications and gluten-free baked goods.

 

Benefits


Gluten-free
Naturally derived
Non-GMO
Plant-based
Vegan


Features


Medium particle size

data.name: NUTRIOSE® FM 06 Soluble Corn Fiber
data.description:
NUTRIOSE® FM 06 corn soluble fiber provides high fiber enrichment of almost any kind of food.

Benefits


Non-GMO
Sugar-free
Proven benefits for digestive health, blood glucose response and energy release
EFISC, Halal and Kosher certified


Features


High fiber content (85%)
High solubility
Low viscosity
Oustanding digestive tolerance

data.name: Roquette GLUCONO DELTA LACTONE T
data.description:
GLUCONO DELTA-LACTONE T is a mild acidity regulator. It provides progressive and gentle acidification for feta, cottage, mozzarella and other cheese. 

Features


Medium-grained powder 
BSE-free
Non-GMO
TSE-free

data.name: NUTRALYS® S85 Plus N Pea Protein Isolate
data.description:
NUTRALYS® S85 Plus N pea protein can be used to enrich plant-based protein powder mixes, RTD and bars, cookies and more.

Features


Minor green taste compared to other pea proteins
High solubility
Low viscosity

filters.filter_name: Not Hazardous under OSHA Hazard Communication Standard

content_blocks.html:
• Relative evolution of the thickness of the biceps brachii over the study period
  • Analysis on the population with a moderate muscle strength

 

n=20 for Control group, n=17 for NUTRALYS® group, n=31 for Whey group

 

 

With appropriate exercise, NUTRALYS® pea protein promoted a significant increase in muscle mass.

content_blocks.key: Short Term Satiety and Caloric Reduction
content_blocks.html:
Caloric intake measured at the ad-libitum lunch

NUTRALYS® pea protein induced a significant decrease of the caloric intake during the ad libitum meal (down to 11%)
content_blocks.display_name: Short Term Satiety and Caloric Reduction

content_blocks.html:
• Highly quality pea protein isolate (85% on DS)
  • Source of BCAA (branched-chain amino acids)
  • Leucine 8.2g, Isoleucine 4.7g and Valine 5g per 100g protein (Nx6.25)
  • Alternative and/or complementary to milk and soy proteins
  • Low isoflavone content
  • Easy digestible
  • Faster-digesting protein compared to casein
  • Yellow peas require no irrigation and no nitrogen fertilization

data.name: NUTRALYS® F85F Pea Protein Isolate
data.description: NUTRALYS® F85F is a functional pea protein with a fine particle size that provides emulsifying and gelling properties for many applications including cereals, snacks, and protein bars. Product availability varies by region.

data.name: NUTRALYS® TP-C Pea Protein Textured
data.description: NUTRALYS® TP-C is a textured pea protein exhibiting high fibrous texture, tender bite and neutral taste ideal for meat substitutes such as plant-based fish fingers and spread. Product availability varies by region.

data.name: NUTRALYS® TP701G Pea Protein Textured
data.description: NUTRALYS® TP701G is a textured pea protein ideal for delicious plant-based meat such as tacos and sausage. It brings a firm and juicy texture, and a very good taste profile. Product availability varies by region.

data.name: NUTRALYS® F85M Organic - EXP
data.description: NUTRALYS® F85M Organic - EXP is a medium-sized functional pea protein with emulsifying and gelling properties. This beige powder is used as a protein source and emulsifier in a variety of culinary applications, such as meat analogs, sauces, and gluten-free baked goods.

data.name: NUTRALYS® S85F Organic - EXP
data.description: NUTRALYS® S85F Organic - EXP is a pea protein isolate with a fine particle size and good solubility, designed for wet applications such as plant-based milk & RTD beverages, other non-dairy alternatives, or clinical nutrition products. Product availability varies by region.

data.name: NUTRALYS® I850XF
data.description: NUTRALYS® rice protein is a safe and familiar source of plant protein, complementing NUTRALYS® pea protein for complete vegan protein supplementation. It is a good alternative to dairy and meat and a great addition to plant-based foods and beverages that support consumers' active lifestyle.

data.name: NUTRALYS® S85XF Organic
data.description: NUTRALYS® S85XF Organic is a beige powdered organic pea protein derived from yellow peas (Pisum sativum). With a slight odor, this natural, plant-based protein serves as an excellent protein source. It's perfect for various applications, such as chocolate bars, clinical nutrition, powdered beverages, and protein bars. It boasts labeling claims of non-GMO, organic, plant-based, and naturally derived, making it a versatile choice for both human nutrition and animal feed.

data.name: NUTRALYS® F85G
data.description: NUTRALYS® F85G is a beige powder with plant-based and natural origins. This versatile ingredient offers a label-friendly solution with claims such as plant-based, non-GMO, gluten-free, and naturally derived. With features like emulsifying properties, a balanced amino acid profile, improved water retention, and high digestibility, it serves various purposes, including weight management, protein enrichment, and muscle mass improvement. This odorless powder with a neutral taste ensures ease of incorporation, making it an excellent choice for applications such as flow enhancement and gelling, in addition to its high protein content.

data.name: NUTRALYS® TP65M

summary.name: Labeling Claims
items: Not Hazardous under OSHA Hazard Communication Standard

data.name: NUTRALYS® Fava Bean Protein
NUTRALYS® H85
data.description: NUTRALYS® H85 is a pea protein hydrolysate of plant origin designed as a versatile protein source across multiple industries. It is allergen-free, naturally derived, odor-free and plant-based. In agrochemicals, it functions as a bioenhancer and fertilizer, promoting enhanced root hair growth, improved harvest efficiency and increased bioavailability. It also serves as a protein source in animal feed, food ingredients, and pharmaceuticals, supporting nutrition and fortification needs.

data.name: NUTRALYS® S85F Pea Protein Isolate
data.description:
NUTRALYS® S85F Pea Protein Isolate is a solubilizer that can be used for wet applications such as plant-based milk beverages, egg-free glazing and clinical nutrition products.  Protein Content: 85% Protein on D.S (dry substance).

Note: Product availability varies by region.


Benefits


	Plant-Based
	Naturally Derived
	Non-GMO
	BSE-free
	Gluten-free
	Halal and Kosher certified
	Melamine-free
	TSE-free
	Vegan


Features


	Fine particle size
	Good solubility

data.name: NUTRALYS® Pea Protein Isolate S85XF
data.description:
NUTRALYS® Pea Protein Isolate S85XF is designed for specialized nutrition applications.

Benefits


Provides a smooth texture to finished products
Reduces grittiness in products such as powder drinks and protein bars


Features


Extra-fine particle size
Good powder dispersibility in cold water





Product availability varies by region.

This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

0.TITLE: Knowde for Suppliers

1.TITLE: Knowde for Distributors
1.DESCRIPTION: Delight both your principals and your customers with a modern online experience that differentiates your brand and accelerates business growth.

0.TITLE: Master Data Management Platform

2.TITLE: Knowde Marketplace

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
